description: This file defines a 'User' class in the 'FrndAppBackend.Models' namespace, representing an application user with fields for identification, authentication, profile info, and relationships to friend requests and messages.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents an application user with authentication and profile fields, including relationships to friend requests and messages.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the user, initialized with a new GUID.

properties.name: Email
properties.description: User's email address, required, max length 100.

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: Timestamp of user creation, initialized to current UTC time.

properties.name: SentFriendRequests
properties.description: Collection of friend requests sent by the user.

properties.name: ReceivedFriendRequests
properties.description: Collection of friend requests received by the user.
